name: Drift Demons
description: Drift demons is a free and endless Bullet Hell game with unique gameplay and gimics. select one out of 7 rides, all with unique abilities, and jump straigh in with the press of a button. nine lives, a minugun, and no way out but death, you must drift around the map, blasting bullets into the sides of the screen and straight through enemies, but there is one thing to watch out for, bullets only go offscreen after hitting the eddges and switching sides once, (think fight, if you fly into the right side you appear on the left) so drifting in donuts and shotting straigh can creata a screen full of bulets that cut down enemies as they are summoned in! three different enemy types create predictable but chalenging play sessions, tank cars shoot at you as you drift, red cars explode with three hits, and blue with one. music by wax terk on newgrouds, sounds, art, and code by me. and the best thing is, its free!
